FuncDef: This command allows the user to configure the transmit trace in bytes 1 to 255 (skipping byte 0) of the payload structure identifier (PSI) of the OPU overhead. This identifier can be a string or a non-printable sequence of bytes. The length of the string or sequence of bytes cannot exceed 255 bytes.

ParaDef.Info: Sets the PSI trace to the string provided by the user. If the string is less than 255 bytes, the remaining bytes will be set to 0.

[byte1 byte2 to byte64] Sets the PSI trace to the sequence of bytes provided by the user. If the user provides less than 64 bytes, the remaining bytes will be set to 0. A 1 byte sequence of 0xFF will set the default strings. Values-0 to FF, in hexadecimal byte notation.
